name: seal-case
effect: Contains Seals used for decorating Pokéballs.
short_effect: Stores Seals that can be applied to Poké Ball capsules.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A case for storing Seals that can be applied to the exteriors of Poké Balls.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A case for storing Seals that can be applied to the exteriors of Poké Balls.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A case for storing Seals that can be applied to the exteriors of Poké Balls.
